formattedAddress: 1310 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1310 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: We booked Shiran for our 2022 New Year's Eve wedding and he was an absolute HIT!! I had SO many guests come up to us to tell us he was the best wedding DJ and DJ in general they've ever heard, and my husband and I couldn't agree more. Our friends and family also told us they've never seen so many guests hit the dance floor and go for hours like they did at our wedding, and that 100% has to do with Shiran. He kept the party going and his energy is amazing, he even had an outfit change after midnight which was stellar and totally unexpected. Shiran pays total attention to detail with the music we like and we adored his ability to remix two songs to make them into one cohesive banger. If this blurry photo of my husband and I in front of Shiran and his DJ booth (taken by a friend at midnight at our wedding) doesn't say it, then let me be the one to tell you that he is more than worth every penny. If we ever host a large event again, Shiran will be the only DJ we'll call!!

originalText.text: Shiran was a huge hit at our son’s Bar Mitzvah. He brought fun, warmth and a seamless mix of great music that blended our requests with perfect choices of his own. The dance floor was full the entire night. Beyond his DJ skills, Shiran was great to work with and his crew was super nice and energetic; we were extremely happy with the lighting and photo booth. He took pains to understand our taste and communicated throughout the evening to make sure that everyone had a good time. He is genuinely engaged, professional and has a sense of humor – we couldn’t recommend him more!

originalText.text: Little kids, older people, and everyone in between said “best bar mitzvah ever”! The bar mitzvah boy and his friends had so much fun. Shiran was very responsive to our specific needs for a neurodiverse group. Every element of the celebration was personally tailored. His staff was very professional. I would hire this team again any time I am having a big event.

originalText.text: We have known and worked with Shiran for over a decade and he never disappoints.  He brings great energy, a professional crew, and an understanding of both what the hosts and guest need. Five stars!

text.text: We have known and worked with Shiran for over a decade and he never disappoints.  He brings great energy, a professional crew, and an understanding of both what the hosts and guest need. Five stars!

originalText.text: Shiran and his team at Nicholson Events are incredible. To say they were a hit is an understatement. Everyone of all generations had a blast, and people are STILL talking about how much fun they had on the dance floor! We absolutely loved the vibe Shiran and his team brought with the music, lights and the photo booth. It was professionalism from start to finish — I will never use another company again when I need something like this. Shiran is amazing and his team is stellar.
